title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Curriculum Development: Social Structure-Based Learning Communities in Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics instructional methods and online learning platform usage experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners exchange feedback on mathematics lesson design with peer teachers at least three times using online collaboration tools.
Learners establish and operate at least one knowledge-sharing community related to mathematics education through social media.
Learners propose strategies to improve student participation rates by over 20% in online mathematics classes by applying web-based collaborative learning models.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
